.full-item-content{width:100%;margin-right:0}}.feed-list .full-item-dek+.full-item-byline{margin-top:0}@media only screen and (min-width:61.25rem){.feed-list .full-item-metadata{float:left;margin-right:2%;width:44.75%;text-align:left;line-height:1;border-top:.0625rem solid #000;margin:.12rem 0 0}}.feed-list .full-item{margin-bottom:1.25rem}@media only .3125rem;text-align:center}@media only screen and (min-width:40.625rem){.feed-list .full-item-content{float:left;margin-right:2%;width:44.75%;padding:0;text-align:left}}.feed-list 673/its-getting-harder-for-government-scientists-to-talk-to-the-press/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":16,"url":"//www.popularmechanics.com/military/a21729409/us-space-force-orbit/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":17,"url":"//www.popularmechanics.com/military/navy-ships/a21756109/the-us-navy-could-grow-to-355-ships-by-2032/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":18,"url":"//www.popularmechanics.com/science/energy/a21756137/renewables-50-percent-energy-2050/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":19,"url":"//www.popularmechanics.com/home/food-drink/a21749996/gas-grill-hard-to-light/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":20,"url":"//www.popularmechanics.com/military/aviation/a21753407/france-germany-teaming-up-to-build-superfighter/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":21,"url":"//www.popularmechanics.com/space/moon-mars/a21753165/mars-dust-storm-goes-global-covers-curiosity-rover/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":22,"url":"//www.popularmechanics.com/science/environment/a21749888/mining-company-buys-rights-to-former-national-monument-land/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":23,"url":"//www.popularmechanics.com/military/research/a21750317/nazi-ufo-model-taken-off-shelves-for-historical-inaccuracy/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":24,"url":"//www.popularmechanics.com/promotions/a21749610/daily-deals-june-21/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":25,"url":"//www.popularmechanics.com/home/food-drink/a21272152/jeffersons-whiskey-experiment/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":26,"url":"//www.popularmechanics.com/science/animals/a21272158/amnh-unseen-oceans-exhibit/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":27,"url":"//www.popularmechanics.com/cars/car-technology/a21732303/2018-ford-mustang-gt-quick-drive/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":28,"url":"//www.popularmechanics.com/science/animals/a21730902/dinosaurs-could-barely-use-their-tongues/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":29,"url":"//www.popularmechanics.com/technology/gadgets/g1748/gift-guide-for-foodies/"},{"@type":"ListItem","position":30,"url":"//www.popul a=x[s],u=a.toUpperCase()+"_"+r;if(u in i)return"@-"+a.toLowerCase()+"-"+n}return!1};C.atRule=N;var A=function(){function e(e,n){var o;return e?(n&&"string"!=typeof n||(n=f(n||"div")),e="on"+e,o=e in e}();C.hasEvent=A,Modernizr.addTest("pointerevents",function(){var e=!1,n=P.length;for(e=Modernizr.hasEvent("pointerdown");n--&&!e;)A(P[n]+"pointerdown")&&(e=!0);return e});var   </head>
  <body class="locale-en homepage">
   <header class="marquee bg-image lazyload lazyload-in-view homepage-marquee only-marquee video-marquee">

      </a>

        <a href="https://www.pinterest.com/popmech/?auto_follow=1">
         Pinterest
        </a>
       </li>
       <li class="sidepanel-submenu-item">
        <a href="https://www.youtube.com/c/popularmechanics?sub_confirmation=1">
         Youtube
        </a>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </li>
     <li class="sidepanel-item" data-id="2">
      <a href="https://preferences.hearstmags.com/brands/POP/subscribe.aspx?authId=50C3533A-9CD0-4843-958C-A82DBA13FBFF&amp;maj=WNL&amp;min=UNDEF">
       Get Our Newsletter
      </a>
     </li>

       </a>

        </p>

        This Pro Skydiver Was Invincible—Until his Heart Stopped Beating Regularly
       </a>
       <div class="full-item-dek item-dek">

     <div class="collection-breaker ">
      <div class="collection-breaker-header">
       <a class="collection-breaker-title" href="/product-reviews/">
        Best Product Reviews of 2018
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="collection-breaker-items">
       <div class="simple-item collection-breaker-item ">
        <a class="simple-item-image item-image" data-vars-ga-call-to-action="The Best Hiking Socks for Summer Treks" data-vars-ga-position="1" data-vars-ga-total-positions="3" data-vars-ga-ux-element="Collection Breaker" href="/adventure/outdoor-gear/g21604036/best-summer-hiking-socks/">

      <div class="full-item-content">
       <a class="full-item-title item-title" href="/technology/infrastructure/a21272148/e-bikes-everywhere/">
        Every Kind of Bike Is Going Electric
       </a>
       <div class="full-item-dek item-dek">
        <p>
         Two wheels, three top speeds, no exhaust. E-bikes are about to be everywhere.

      <a class="full-item-image item-image" href="/science/environment/a21777626/china-stops-buying-the-worlds-trash-leaving-120-million-tons-up-for-grabs/">
       <img alt="a mountain of plastic goods at a recycling plant" class="lazyload lazyload-in-view" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/a-mountain-of-plastic-goods-at-a-recycling-high-res-stock-photography-678799848-1529691762.jpg?crop=1.00xw:0.803xh;0,0&amp;resize=480:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/a-mountain-of-plastic-goods-at-a-recycling-high-res-stock-photography-678799848-1529691762.jpg?crop=1.00xw:0.803xh;0,0&amp;resize=768:* 980w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title="a mountain of plastic goods at a recycling plant"/>
      </a>
      <div class="full-item-metadata">
       <a class="item-parent-link full-item-parent-link" href="/science/environment/">
        Earth
       </a>
       <div class="publish-date full-item-publish-date js-date" data-format="MMM D, YYYY" data-publish-date="2018-06-22T20:00:00Z">
        Jun 22, 2018
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="full-item-content">
       <a class="full-item-title item-title" href="/science/environment/a21777626/china-stops-buying-the-worlds-trash-leaving-120-million-tons-up-for-grabs/">
        China Stops Buying the World's Trash, Leaving 120 Million Tons Up for Grabs
       </a>
       <div class="full-item-dek item-dek">
        <p>
         Over 120 million tons of plastic trash will have to find a new home over the next decade, according to a new report.
        </p>
       </div>
       <!-- shared/byline -->
       <div class="byline full-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">

     <div class="full-item ">
      <a class="full-item-image item-image" href="/space/a21766089/rocket-lab-its-business-time-launch/">
       <img alt="" class="lazyload lazyload-in-view" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/electron-itsbusinesstime-1529680757.jpg?crop=1.00xw:0.752xh;0.00160xw,0.248xh&amp;resize=480:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/electron-itsbusinesstime-1529680757.jpg?crop=1.00xw:0.752xh;0.00160xw,0.248xh&amp;resize=768:* 980w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title="rocket-lab-electron.jpg"/>
      </a>
      <div class="full-item-metadata">
       <a class="item-parent-link full-item-parent-link" href="/space/">
        Space
       </a>
       <div class="publish-date full-item-publish-date js-date" data-format="MMM D, YYYY" data-publish-date="2018-06-22T16:16:00Z">
        Jun 22, 2018
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="full-item-content">
       <a class="full-item-title item-title" href="/space/a21766089/rocket-lab-its-business-time-launch/">
        Rocket Lab to Attempt "It's Business Time" Launch Tonight
       </a>
       <div class="full-item-dek item-dek">
        <p>
         The first fully commercial launch for Rocket Lab is set to blast off.
        </p>
       </div>
       <!-- shared/byline -->
       <div class="byline full-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">

       </a>
       <div class="full-item-dek item-dek">
        <p>
         A new analysis finds that lowered costs plus cheaper battery storage results in way more renewable energy over the next few decades.
        </p>

       <img alt="" class="lazyload lazyload-in-view" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/pia22486-main-1529603494.jpg?crop=1.00xw:0.655xh;0,0.0439xh&amp;resize=480:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/pia22486-main-1529603494.jpg?crop=1.00xw:0.655xh;0,0.0439xh&amp;resize=768:* 980w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title="Curiosity Dust Storm"/>
      </a>
      <div class="full-item-metadata">
       <a class="item-parent-link full-item-parent-link" href="/space/moon-mars/">
        Moon and Mars
       </a>
       <div class="publish-date full-item-publish-date js-date" data-format="MMM D, YYYY" data-publish-date="2018-06-21T18:55:00Z">
        Jun 21, 2018
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="full-item-content">
       <a class="full-item-title item-title" href="/space/moon-mars/a21753165/mars-dust-storm-goes-global-covers-curiosity-rover/">
        Mars Dust Storm Goes Global, Covers Curiosity Rover
       </a>
       <div class="full-item-dek item-dek">
        <p>
         While bad news for the Opportunity rover, this gives NASA a great chance to study the storm up close.
        </p>
       </div>
       <!-- shared/byline -->
       <div class="byline full-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
        By
        <a class="byline-name" data-vars-ga-call-to-action="Avery Thompson" data-vars-ga-ux-element="Byline" href="/author/16191/avery-thompson/" itemprop="name" rel="author">

        <li class="footer-legal-menu-item nav-item" data-id="3">
         <a href="https://www.hearst.com/newsroom/us-magazines-privacy-notice#_INTEREST_BASED" target="_blank">
          Interest-Based Ads
         </a>
        </li>
        <li class="footer-legal-menu-item nav-item" data-id="4">
         <a href="http://www.hearst.com/newsroom/us-magazines-terms-of-use" target="_blank">
          Updated Terms of Use
         </a>
        </li>
        <li class="footer-legal-menu-item nav-item" data-id="5">
         <a href="/sitemap/">
          Site Map
         </a>
        </li>
       </ul>
      </div>
     </div>
    </footer>
    <!-- / footers/main -->
    <script id="autosuggest-link-template" type="text/template">
     <li>
 		<a href="<%= data.searchLink %>" class="search-overlay-autosuggest-link" data-type="<%= data.type %>" >
 			<%= data.label.replace( data.term, "<span class=\"search-overlay-autosuggest-link-type\" >" + data.term + "</span>" ) %>
 		</a>
 	</li>
    </script>
   </div>
   <script id="deferred-css-script-tag">
    ( function( d, Modernizr ) {
 	d.addEventListener( "DOMContentLoaded", function() {
 		var l, h = d.getElementsByTagName( "head" )[ 0 ],
 		f = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/popularmechanics/assets/css/homepage.440de1f.css"],
 		m = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/popularmechanics/assets/css/homepage-mobile.22e768b.css"];
 
 		for ( var i = 0, len = f.length; i < len; i++ ) {
 			l = d.createElement( "link" );
 			l.rel = "stylesheet";
 			l.href = Modernizr && Modernizr.mobile ? m[ i ] : f[ i ];
 
 			h.parentNode.insertBefore( l, h );
 		}
 	} );
 } )( document, Modernizr );
   </script>
